resources.string: Select the device to cast to
Can\'t find the device you want to cast to? Please check
Are the device and phone connected to the same network?
Does the device support screen casting?
Not connected to Wi-Fi, please check the network settings
The device and phone need to be connected to the same network for successful screen casting
The device and phone need to be connected to the same network for successful screen casting
Network unavailable, please check your network setting
Turn on your smart TV or set-top box and make sure it is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your phone.
Tap the upper right corner button of the App video player to cast to the corresponding device.
Why can\'t I find the casting device
You can perform the following checks:
Make sure the casting device is powered on and connected to the same Wi-Fi as your phone.
The device supports screen casting. If you are unsure, we recommend consulting the device manufacturer.
The AP isolation or guest mode function of the router has been turned off, and the signal amplifier network is not connected. If necessary, you can restart the router and other network devices.
If the above issues are confirmed, please restart the App and try screen casting again.
How to solve screen casting failure
Please check if the device can access the network normally. If necessary, you can restart the router and other network devices, or restart the App and try screen casting again.
Current network is unstable, data transmission is slow...
